title: Rodomontados. Or, Brauadoes and bragardismes. Collected out of the commentaries of the most dreadfull, terrible, and inuincible capitaine; Mattamores, Crocodillo, Raiabroquelos
author: Gaultier, Jacques.
notes: A translation of a French version of: Gaultier, Jacques. Rodomuntadas castellanas.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
